alert.note: Alert for Cass; Otoe (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 16 at 9:36PM CDT until June 16 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1000 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN FREMONT...SOUTHWESTERN MILLS...NORTH CENTRAL OTOE AND CASS COUNTIES... At 935 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Murray, or 14 miles south of Offutt AFB, moving east at 60 mph. Hail up to one inch has already been reported with this storm. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Plattsmouth and Beaver Lake around 940 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Pacific Junction, Glenwood, Tabor, Randolph and Malvern. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
